item.title: How Bandwidth Can Affect Productivity
item.description: Businesses are grappling with decisions about bandwidth allocation, often facing costs calculated per Megabit per second (Mbps). While strategies exist to maximize Mbps per dollar, it’s essential to first understand the correlation between network bandwidth and employee productivity. If your bandwidth is primarily used for non-work activities, reducing it might seem like a productivity booster. However, most businesses rely heavily on internal and external network connectivity for operations. So, how do you determine the appropriate bandwidth level?
